input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Camdon 6.5' Green Fir Trees Artificial Christmas Tree with 550 LED Multi-Colored'
  - Name='Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Lights The Holiday Aisle Light'
  - Name='Slaytonville Lighted Fir Christmas Tree Millwood Pines'
  - Name='Red Barrel Studio 7.5' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='WELLFOR Pre-lit Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights TX-HGY'
  - Name='Frontgate Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Sterling 4-Feet Alpine Pre-lit Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 5' Green Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 Clear Lights'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Glendaliz 5.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Traditional Prelit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7-ft Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Chatham Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Winchester Pine 6 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Vickerman 8.5' Oregon Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Nordic Spruce Medium Hinged Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 5' x 28" Mixed Green Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7.5' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman Douglas Blue Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Camdon 6.5' Green Fir Trees Artificial Christmas Tree with 550 LED Multi-Colored
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and fir tree shape, but uses multi-colored LED lights instead of clear and a different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Lights The Holiday Aisle Light
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Downswept Douglas Fir style with lights, similar silhouette and function but different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Slaytonville Lighted Fir Christmas Tree Millwood Pines
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with lights but no mention of downswept style or pre-lit with similar construction; different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Red Barrel Studio 7.5' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir pre-lit tree, taller height, likely similar construction but different brand and no mention of downswept style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR Pre-lit Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights TX-HGY
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but pencil (slim) style, quite different silhouette and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but no specifics about downswept Douglas Fir style or pre-lit features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling 4-Feet Alpine Pre-lit Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim alpine tree, smaller height and different silhouette than a downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 5' Green Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 300 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with clear lights, shorter height, less light count, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir tree with similar height and lighting, likely similar purpose but different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glendaliz 5.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with lights at shorter height; less close in size and likely less full branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree with lights, but no specifics on style or pre-lit construction similar to downswept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Traditional Prelit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional prelit tree, likely different shape but same pre-lit function; fir type not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft prelit Douglas Fir tree, similar brand style and features except slight height difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7-ft Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Douglas Fir style, slightly taller, no direct mention of downswept style but highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit tree from same company; likely similar materials but Perry style may differ in silhouette from downswept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Chatham Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but slim style and snowy effect differs significantly from downswept Douglas Fir style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Winchester Pine 6 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 8.5' Oregon Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Nordic Spruce Medium Hinged Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with hinged branches but spruce species and medium size differ from downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir with similar size and lighting features; different brand with likely comparable construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman Douglas Blue Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Blue Fir variety, different brand and possibly different style but related species and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6-ft tall downswept or similar style Douglas Fir pre-lit tree; similar size and features with different brand.
